anathema: Discriminate or slight someone based on appearance, intentionally disfigure a creature, refuse food to the starving
area_of_concern_raw: Dance, joy, love, music, the sky
edict: Give wealth to new families, aid traders and miners, support musicians, protect and encourage lovers

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Give wealth to new families, aid traders and miners, support musicians, protect and encourage lovers

**Anathema** Discriminate or slight someone based on appearance, intentionally disfigure a creature, refuse food to the starving

**Area of Concern**
Dance, joy, love, music, the sky

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=398)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=99)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68)

- **2nd**

- **8th**
[Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1730)
